revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road Johto |image = [[File:Victory Road Johto.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Victory Road Johto. |tokens = 7,000 |location = Route 26, south of Indigo Plateau Johto. }} '''Victory Road Johto''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 128,500 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || colspan=2 rowspan=4| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Rhyhorn.png|40px]] Rhyhorn |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash || rowspan=2|<center> 500,000 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Rhydon.png|40px]] Rhydon |}
==Items==
===No Debuff===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 6 || 66.95% || 65.10% || 57.14% |- | {{Pokemon|Graveler}} || N/A || 11.16% || 10.85% || 9.52% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 3.47% || 3.69% || 4.62% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 3.47% || 3.69% || 4.62% |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 3.47% || 3.69% || 4.62% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 3.47% || 3.69% || 4.62% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 3.47% || 3.69% || 4.62% |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 3.47% || 3.69% || 4.62% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || 2 || 0.30% || 0.48% || 1.27% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || 2 || 0.30% || 0.48% || 1.27% |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || 2 || 0.30% || 0.48% || 1.27% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.15% || 0.24% || 0.63% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.23% || 1.18% |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 6 || 64.87% || 64.87% || 64.87% |- | {{Pokemon|Graveler}} || N/A || 10.81% || 10.81% || 10.81% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 4.04% || 4.04% || 4.04% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 4.04% || 4.04% || 4.04% |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 4.04% || 4.04% || 4.04% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 4.04% || 4.04% || 4.04% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 4.04% || 4.04% || 4.04% |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 4.04% || 4.04% || 4.04% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Earth Plate}} || 2 || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || 2 || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || 2 || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.01% || 0.01% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
